title: Episode 61 w/ Run The Jewels
itunes:title: Episode 61 w/ Run The Jewels
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode of the Drink Champs the guys drink it up with Killer Mike and EL-P collectively known as Run The Jewels. They talk about everything about how RTJ came together, their individual history, independence, politics and a lot more. All while experiencing shots of Tiger Bone! --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
